articles.content:

articles.title: FIFA to implement VAR changes which will impact Manchester United and Man City - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: VAR has endured a controversial debut season in English football but changes are in place which will affect Man Utd and Manchester City.
articles.content:
The Premier League have lost control over their use of VAR after FIFA took full control of the technology protocol.

articles.content:
